-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://globalelectronicsadls.dfs.core.windows.net/global-electronic-files/GlobalElectronicTrainingData/SalesTrainingData/part-00000-f6d0a1bd-bbf2-4580-913f-2f5943384ded-c000.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
